title: Keylocker Turn Based Cyberpunk Action (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Play as a singer in this JRPG! Claim Keylocker Turn Based Cyberpunk Action for free via Epic Games Store! Keylocker Turn Based Cyberpunk Action is a Rhythm JRPG with unique style and gameplay.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Pilgrims (Epic Games) Giveaway
description:
Score Pilgrims for free via Epic Games Store! Pilgrims is a 2d adventure game, created by the team behind Machinarium and Samorost.

*EDIT: Pilgrims (Mobile version) is also available via Epic Games Store App for iPhone, iPad, and Android.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

*Visit the Epic Games Store App on Mobile to grab the Mobile version of this game.
platforms: PC, Android, iOS, Epic Games Store
